attributes.action: For the House Of Commons to rebuke the Prime Minister, David Cameron
attributes.additional_details: The Prime Minister has woefully misrepresented the interests of the United Kingdom in his negotiations with the EU and its member governments. Accordingly, he is worthy of public and Parliamentary censure.
attributes.background: The Prime Minister promised "Fundemental" changes to our relationship with the EU.  He returned with worthless concessions which have failed to address the reform of the unelected and unaccountable European Commission, the Common Agricultural and Fisheries Policies and the unaudited EU Budget.

rejection.details: We think that the following petition is similar to yours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/123469
